scrap 0.1.1
  • Reference

Package index

Discovering dependencies

Functions for discovering libraries used in a project.

discover_libraries()
Discover R libraries used in project
list_missing_libraries()
List libraries not installed

Time conversion

Convert from Unix and Posix timestamp.

fromUnixTime()
Convert a Unix time to a timestamp
fromPosixTime()
Convert a Posix time to a timestamp

Miscellanea

Various functions.

use_db_function()
Create a function to access PRISME's Oracle DB
use_gitignore()
Create a .gitignore for R projects
`%ni%`
The negation of the value matching operator
nth_group()
Extract nth (or multiple sub-) group
shhh()
Suppresses console output, including printing
